abstract: Tennis veteran Aaron Kirckstein defeats Jimmy Connors in exhibition rematch of their epic 1991 faceoff.
lead_paragraph: Nearly a quarter-century after their epic 1991 match at the United States Open, Jimmy Connors and Aaron Krickstein had a rematch at an exhibition in Boca Raton, Fla.
snippet: Nearly a quarter-century after their epic 1991 match at the United States Open, Jimmy Connors and Aaron Krickstein had a rematch at an exhibition in Boca Raton, Fla.
